pullRequest.title: fix median and percentile aggregators bugs when used as reducer
pullRequest.bodyText:
median aggregator was not usable as reducer, or returned the wrong result.
position median was done on raw hhcode

example of non working code :
https://snapshot.senx.io/00059c2130c8d5f8-0-4-5f8666e22df55aa3
https://snapshot.senx.io/00059c21362565e0-0-7-025b60d11920474c

commit.message: recode median aggregator to fix reducer.median bugs

nodes.bodyText: Retrieve the name from outside the comparator.
Explain strategy for sorting in the presence of nulls
If there is only one location (same goes for elevation), wouldn't it be better to return that location (resp. elevation)?

commit.message: fix the percentile aggregator null pointer exception
returns long if inputs are long, for bucketizer retrocompatibility
fix median: one location is better than nothing.

nodes.bodyText: missing whitespace before call to getName
